<script>
(function() {
  const WORKER_URL = 'https://mute-poetry-9d98.roman-bartnik.workers.dev/';
  const ARTICLE_TOPIC = 'Beispiele f√ºr 5 spezifische schwierige Konzepte und Schwierigkeiten f√ºr Studierende in dem genannten Bereich. 5 Stichpunkte f√ºr Ideen, wie Studierende hierf√ºr individuelle Erkl√§rungen oder Feedback erhalten k√∂nnen';

  const btn = document.getElementById('submit-btn');
  const input = document.getElementById('industry-input');
  const responseArea = document.getElementById('response-area');
  const responseText = document.getElementById('response-text');

  async function getRelevance() {
    const industry = input.value.trim();
    if (!industry) {
      alert('In welchem Fachgebiet unterrichten Sie? (z.B. Maschinenbau');
      return;
    }

    btn.disabled = true;
    btn.textContent = '‚è≥';
    responseArea.style.display = 'block';
    responseText.textContent = 'Denke nach...';

    try {
      const response = await fetch(WORKER_URL, {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({
          industry: industry,
          topic: ARTICLE_TOPIC
        })
      });

      const data = await response.json();

      if (data.error) {
        responseText.textContent = 'Fehler: ' + data.error;
      } else {
        responseText.textContent = data.relevance;
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Error:', error);
      responseText.textContent = 'Netzwerkfehler. Bitte erneut versuchen.';
    } finally {
      btn.disabled = false;
      btn.textContent = 'Los';
    }
  }

  btn.addEventListener('click', getRelevance);
  input.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
    if (e.key === 'Enter') getRelevance();
  });
})();
</script>
